alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 26 at 1:42PM MST until August 26 at 5:30PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected along Stockton Hill Road and along or near Route 66 northeast of Kingman. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Arizona, including the following county, Mohave. * WHEN...Until 445 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Rises in small streams and normally dry washes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 140 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is already occurring on Stockton Hill Road near Vock Canyon. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Stockton Hill Road is the most likely place to experience minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Kingman and New Kingman-Butler. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
